p1.system: The earliest date you can get your State Pension is __statePensionDate__.
p1.user: According to the information you have given us, the earliest date you can get your State Pension is __statePensionDate__.

beforeSpa.p2:
You will get your State Pension from this date unless
you tell us a different date.

p1.system: Your State Pension date is __statePensionDate__.
p1.user: According to the information you have given us, your State Pension date is __statePensionDate__.

afterSpa.p2: If you do not want your State Pension from this date, tell us a different date.
